column5: Just starting to get a little bit worried.  I have an annual ice fishing trip with the boys planned for January 11th-16th on Lake Nippising.  Things not looking too good right now for having ice.  Anybody else getting the jitters about a planned trip????
We're booked for the 19th.  Fingers are crossed!!
14 day outlook for North Bay doesn't give much hope for ice making on the lake. http://www.theweathernetwork.com/weather/1...84.htm?CAON0484
Remember Rick, those are daytime highs.  Lots more night-time this time of year.  I think Nip Ice will be ok mid-january.
I just saw the forecast for my area and will be in the teens again around New YEars...outdoor parties will be big
Well....with any luck we will be out on first ice Raf....First safe ice that is.
Just take some chubby friends and have them go first... Oh..and bring some rope.
the 11th?, the 19th?  try January 4th!  man i hope it gets cold:(
yeah mine is Jan 5 on nip....I think I will be renting a boat....houseboat then I can still stay on the lake....
Would you like me to ask Santa for cold weather for xmas?    We only have an inch of snow here!  Pam
It's looking pretty iffy for you guys based on the long range forecasts. It's been really mild this year!  Mike
Better grease the bearings on your boat trailer! haha  good lucks man!
